text: Soni kulikose kumpite (mmwe Muhammadi ï·º) basi galauchisyani ngope jenu ku Nsikiti Wakuchimbichika, nombe palipose pachim'be wanganyammwe basi galauchisyani ngope syenu ku upandeo, kuti wandu akasakola malowe gakutatawana namwe, ikaweje wawowopeo walitendele lupuso mwa jamanjao, basi ngasimwajogopaga wanganyao nambo munjogopeje Une, ni kuti ngwanilisye chindimba Changu pa jenumanja kuti n'jongoche
